text: Vy pobachyte , shcho vony zustrichayet聞sya z tse, prynyzhenym ta debased, ta dyvlyachyy, vse shche probuyuchyy shchob unyknuty dyvlyat聞sya. Tsey khto povirenyy proholosyt聞: real聞nyy losers ye tsey khto zahubyly yikhni dushi ta yikhni sim'yi na Dni Resurrection. Porushnyky zasluzhyly everlasting retribution
